information: MercoStevia International represents an agricultural cooperative in ARGENTINA. Stevia is grown and collected there from local producers. We´ve established ourselves this year in Spain having the intention of exporting the DRIED STEVIA LEAVES across the globe.Elaborated Stevia Rebaudiana Bertoni. Origin land: Argentina. Size ABC Average values determined upon dry base: Total steviol glycosides: 10.5% to 12.5%Relationship Stevioside / Rebaudioside A: 1.5 to 2.5The leaves are provided with their: Origin Certificate, Phytosanitary Certificate, Quality Certification (attached upside), Commercial Invoice and Bill of Lading.
